hero.subtitle: Fullstack Developer mai gogewa na shekaru biyar wajen samar da manhajoji kasuwanci masu tsaro, masu girma da babban aiki.

about.title: Game da Ni
about.description: Ina sha'awar rubuta lambar da take da tsabta da girma da koyan sabbin kayan aiki koyaushe. Ina da ƙarfin haɗin gwiwa na nesa, gogewa na Agile kuma ni mai koyo ne koyaushe - yanzu ina ƙarfafa gwajin atomatik da ayyukan tsaro.

axa.name: AXA Mansard Insurance Plc
achievements: Na jagoranci gine-gine da aiwatar da Tsarin Sarrafa Jagora ta amfani da .NET, Angular 19, da SQL Server.
Na aiwatar da matakan tsaro, kamar ɓoyewa da buɗewa don mahimman kaya, RBAC.
Na sabunta abubuwan gado ta hanyar sake fasalin tambayoyi da ƙarshen don rage bashin fasaha, kuma na cimma haɓakar aiki 25%.
Na haɗa tsarin sanarwa na ainihi ta amfani da SignalR, wanda ke ba da damar sabuntawa masu canzawa a cikin dandamali.
Na shiga cikin bukukuwan Agile (shirye-shiryen sprint, sake dubawa, tsayawa) kuma na sake duba buƙatun cirewa a Azure DevOps.
Na ba da gudummawa ga bututun DevOps, yana inganta inganci a CI/CD a Azure DevOps.
Na koyar da masu haɓakawa ƙanana 2 a cikin sake duban lambar takwarorinsu da yawo na ayyuka.

harmoni.name: Harmoni Technologies
achievements: Na canza buƙatun abokan ciniki da bayanin matsalolin kasuwanci zuwa Web API mai girma ta amfani da .NET Core.
Na tilasta mafi kyawun ayyuka ta hanyar sake duba lambar da sarrafa sigar Git.
Na ƙirƙira .NET Core Microservices masu girma.

bytes.name: Bytes Intel Limited
achievements: Na ba da shawara kai tsaye tare da abokan ciniki don kafa buƙatun kasuwanci da samfur.
Na gina kuma na tura tsarin eCommerce ta amfani da .NET Framework, Web API da SQL Server.
Na haɓaka kuma na ba da kulawa har zuwa gidajen yanar gizo .NET huɗu (4).

mymonie.title: MyMonie
mymonie.description: Software na bin kuɗi da nazari. Na gina ainihin bin kuɗi da kasafin kuɗi tare da .NET 8 da Angular. Yanzu ina binciken haɗin GPT API don fasaloli na kasafin kuɗi mai hankali.
